title: Insert M Into N
description: This Python challenge is about inserting a 16-bit number m into another 16-bit number n such that m starts at bit j and ends at bit i.

meta.title: Inserting M into N: A Python Coding Challenge
meta.description: Learn how to insert a 16-bit number M into another 16-bit number N using Python.
